cause.description:
Are you sick and tired of having to endure being beside a person that does not have any regard for the odor that comes out from his/hers/its armpit? that walks around everyday with a fucking sweat-sink under their arms. worst of all is that you cant really say anything! well fuck THIS shit, lets put these sons of bitches in jail.
1. Im not 100 percent certain but i think that the bad smell of people who do not use deodorants is the leading cause of holes in the ozone layer.
2. In china 9 children were killed from the horrible smell caused by their parents armpit odor.
3. B.O is the leading cause of forest fires in canada.
cause.mission: punish people who do not use deodorants
cause.name: people who do not use deodorant should be put in jail
